data.title: High quality and knowledgeable
data.text: I have purchased my cat food from The Pampurr'd Pet, ever since they opened. I love to shop locally and I love that I can get my questioned answered right away and professionally. Kristi knows all her products and has experience in every aspect of healthcare for my animals. I will always continue to shop here and look forward to them growing! Great food and toy options, that are healthy and safe.

data.title: Good place to go after farmer's market
data.text:
My wife Angie and I are from the Appleton area. We have a 2-year-old Shi Tzu named Bunny and a 12 year-old Bloodhound named Tanner. We're both retired gov't employees. 

A few weeks ago we took a trip down to the Oshkosh Farmer's Market and noticed this cute little store on the way there. Needless to say that Bunny and Tanner loved the store. They got a treat and my wife bought a bunch of nuance items for our dogs (she's obsessed with their appearance us being "empty nesters" and all). 

The young man with the goattee was a excellent sales clerk and a down-to-earth guy. We are definitely going to make another trip down to the store once Bunny and Tan are done with their toys. I told this young man that they need to start a chain of these stores and expand once they get some time in. He's got that business acumen and what it takes.

-Al

data.title: Great place to get everything you need to pamper your pet
data.text: I have never met someone who loves and cares about her pets more than Kristi. she is very knowledgeable in all things pets. She takes the guess work out of buying quality products for your pet.

data.title: Must see pet store!  Your own personal shoppers!
data.text: Great pet store! Staff is incredibly knowledgeable about all aspects of your furry friends!  A must see place when visiting Oshkosh!

data.title: The perfect place for a furry friend
data.text: Love this local pet store!! Great healthy food and treats for your fur babies. Plenty of options to choose from. A lot of USA made treats and fun toys to. Owners are very help when you have any questions on what you are looking for!! Both my Aussies love to visit and pick out their own treat!!
